speaker: Agent
text: Hi, this is Mike calling from XYZ Collections. How the hell are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: Listen up, I need you to verify your date of birth before I can discuss your damn account.

speaker: Customer
text: Sure, my date of birth is January 15, 1990.

speaker: Agent
text: Great, but you're lucky I even have time for this crap. You owe us over $300.

speaker: Customer
text: I understand, but I'd like to arrange a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: A payment plan? Are you kidding me? Just pay the damn thing off already!

speaker: Customer
text: I would like to discuss my options, please.

speaker: Agent
text: Your options? Well, you can either pay up or get ready for some serious collection action!

speaker: Customer
text: I will do my best to sort this out. Can you provide me with the details?

speaker: Agent
text: Fine, but you better not be jerking me around. I’ll send you the info when I can!

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for your assistance. I appreciate it.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, whatever. Just get it done, alright?

speaker: Customer
text: I will. Have a good day.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, you too, I guess. Bye.
